result.arabic_text: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
result.translation: In them there will be maidens of restrained gaze[14], untouched[15] before them by any man or jinn.
result.footnotes:
[14] To their own mates, being chaste and modest.
 [15] Lit., the maidens have not been caused to bleed by loss of virginity.
